Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: J. L. Casto
Reviews.Content: I'm just a casual photographer, don't understand much about how to compose a great picture.  I've managed to take some great shots with this camera (Will post a picture soon).  I'm still working on getting in the habit of using the post processing, but it really makes a difference in the image quality.I wish the camera would remember my processing settings when I turn it off.I've also managed to drop the camera a few times (a couple nasty drops too!) and it's still going strong.  Probably related to the drops, I've recently (after over a year of ownership) had some issues with the flap that opens to get to the battery/sd card.  I have to use a grocery store rewards card to pry it open.  Slightly annoying, but probably my own fault.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.1-megapixel resolution
4x wide-angle optical zoom; 2.7-inch LCD screen
Newly-developed EXILIM Engine 5.0
Make composite images of different moving images with Dynamic Photo; Art Shot Function
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Casio EX-Z550 14.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Zoom with CCD Shift Image Stabilization and 2.7 inch LCD (Silver)
